text: Ji pestire (peymana) wan hevricekeren, ku we bi wan ra peymana (astiye) daye hev u pase ewan hevricekeran ji qe ji we peymane tu tistek kem nekiribin u ewan pistvaniya tu keseki ji li hembere we da ne kiribin,hun ji heya dane pasya peymane hat, ewa peymana ku we daye hev pek binin. Hun bizanin! Bi rasti Yezdan ji parisvanan hez dike
